marklogic.body:
GOOD SATURDAY MORNTIN' aleth. ***BIG HUG** :>)
***fist bump*** - --The --- MILLION DOLLAR QUESTION!! -- -
- - -'cause the LONGER his ARREST drags out - ---the more FEVER-PITCHED - -- EMOTIONS/TENSIONS will RISE!
I'm thinkin'[DANGEROUS - -I KNOW :>)]- - that SINCE the POLICE/SOLICITOR, etc. -- BOTCHED the
PROCEDURES - - Soooo BADLY the FIRST TIME - --THIS TIME - -the PROCEDURES have 2 B - --PRISTINELY EXERCISED!!
Alll that would B needed is 4 a case that would violate his - -
"DUE PROCESS RIGHTS". - - - -THEN - - -he might --"GET OFF" on a TECHNICALITY.
Betcha my simplistic "thoughts" - --R 2 simplistic - --BUT this is the best that I can do. LOL.
Good 2 C U --aleth. :>)
